casebody.data:
No. 10-768. Aftermath Records, dba Aftermath Entertainment, et al., Petitioners v. F.B.T. Productions, LLC, et al. 563 U.S. 1003, 131 S. Ct. 2482,

179 L. Ed. 2d 1238,

2011 U.S. LEXIS 3548. May 16, 2011.

Petition for rehearing denied.

Former decision, 562 U.S. 1286, 131 S. Ct. 1677, 179 L. Ed. 2d 615, 2011 U.S. LEXIS 2255.
